node.name: Quiz
node.rich_text: When must a machine with an identified vulnerability be immediately remediated? Ans.) If that is identified in the risk management process
What agencies maintains oversight of the CVE program? Ans.) US Department of Homeland Security
What is a vulnerability called when it has not yet been disclosed? Ans.) Zero Day Vulnerability

Which is not impacted by a vulnerability? Ans.) Authorization
5.) How does penetration testing relate to risk management? Ans.) Pentesting identifies gaps and vulnerabilities for possible mitigation
6.) What organization maintains the National Vulnerability Database? Ans.) NIST
7.) In what layer of the OSI model are vulnerabilities found? Ans.) All Layers
8.) Who needs to understand vulnerabilities? Ans.) All Cybersecurity Professionals
9.) What size business requires vulnerability management? Ans.) All businesses
10.) Which is an example of a vulnerability? Ans.) bug which gives remote code execution
In first try
